content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense forces struck 1 point of management and 7 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

"Units of missile troops were defeated at 1 land management station of UAV, 1 air defense, 2 stations of the IP, 1 ammunition composition and 1 area of concentration of the enemy's personnel," the statement reads.

We will remind, the enemyComingIn the Bakhmut and Novopavlovsky directions: our soldiers repelled 32 attacks.

As reported by the Armyinform, Defense Forces in the Week4720 invaders were eliminatedand destroyed more than 200 units of armored vehicles.
title: Ukrainian aviation damaged the Russian management point
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. “The missile troops were inflicted ...
author: Army Inform
